##  ANTs tools

* MRI bias correction
* image denoising
* image and point set registration
* $n$-tissue segmentation
* template building
* multi-atlas label fusion
* brain extraction
* cortical thickness estimation
* ANTsR for statistics and visualization

publicly available:  https://github.com/stnava/ANTs
